name: STEMI
title: STEMI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes associated with the diagnosis of STEMI.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
